name: Turn4
_source: speak;Bandit1;Guffah! Time ta loot in the darkness of night!
speak;Bandit2;Guffah! Time ta steal rum in the darkness of night!
speak;Bandit1;Guffah! Time ta drink 'til we forget...
speak;Frost;Can you let me go now?
speak;Bandit1;Silence wench!|You'll be worth a pretty penny.
speak;Bandit2;Guffah! I'm sure one of them noble types would pay a boatload for an Arborstian wife!|You types are hard to pin down, after all!
speak;Frost;I don't want any of this!|Help! Anyone!
speak;Bandit1;Shut yer trap!|If you don't, I'll jus' kill ya!
speak;Sal;Eugh... More trouble to worry about...

speak;Sages;I wouldn't be so pessimistic.|Those bandits might cause more trouble for those ambushers too.|Plus, they seem to have kidnapped a fine maiden! How putrid!|We must save her and not let our enemy do so, or she may ally with them...
speak;Sal;Hm, how perceptive of you.|I suppose we have to pick our battles well.
speak;Sages;How kind of you to say Sal!|It's cooler when you're not on my case...
speak;Sages;Now I wish those bandits were kidnapping me instead...
